Interactive Television: A television program that allows viewers to make choices that affect the outcome of the story, similar to a video game.
Virtual Reality Television: A television program that allows viewers to experience the action in 3D and interact with the characters in real-time.
Augmented Reality Television: A television program that overlays digital content onto the real world, allowing viewers to see additional information or interact with the characters.
Social Media Integration: A television program that allows viewers to interact with the show through social media, such as voting on polls or sharing their thoughts and opinions.
Time Travel Television: A television program that allows viewers to travel back in time and experience historical events as they unfolded.
